name: Apple iPhone 15
description: The iPhone 15 introduces Dynamic Island, bringing live activities and notifications to the forefront, ensuring you never miss a beat. It features a robust design with a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display that’s brighter in sunlight, a 48 MP main camera with 2x telephoto zoom, and next-gen portrait capabilities. Powered by the efficient A16 Bionic Chip, it supports USB-C connectivity and includes vital safety features like SOS via satellite and accident detection.

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
description: The Galaxy S24 Ultra features advanced Galaxy AI for modern searches, real-time translations, note summaries, and effortless photo editing. Its durable titanium frame and Corning® Gorilla® Armor Glass provide enhanced protection, while the S Pen offers precise writing and navigation on the new flat display. The 200 MP camera, with AI processing and ProVisual Engine, captures stunning details, even in low light. Enhanced gameplay is supported by faster processing and a larger vapor chamber, while the long-lasting battery and ultra-bright 2,600-nit display ensure an exceptional user experience.

name: Google Pixel 8
description: The Google Pixel 8, powered by the Tensor G3 chip, delivers fast and efficient performance with AI-driven personalized support. It features a sleek design, partly made from recycled materials, and a vibrant 6.2-inch display with a 120Hz refresh rate for smooth scrolling. The intelligent battery can last over 24 hours, and with extreme power saving mode, up to 72 hours. Enhanced photography features include Best Shot for perfect group photos and Magic Audio Eraser for eliminating unwanted background noise, while night vision and astrophotography capture stunning low-light images.
